column4: hey can someone tell me how to install beryl because synaptic package manager can't find it?!
so what works the same? compiz?
you need to add a repository that contains it,  please hold for a link
http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Install-Compiz-Fusion-on-Ubuntu-58113.shtml it explains how to add the repository, the one for compiz also contains beryl, awn, etc
